verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] decided to postpone for another month steep tariffs on steel and aluminum imported from Canada , Mexico and the European Union .
[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: decided] [ARG1: to postpone for another month steep tariffs on steel and aluminum imported from Canada , Mexico and the European Union] .
[ARG0: President Trump] has decided to [V: postpone] [ARGM-TMP: for another month] [ARG1: steep tariffs on steel and aluminum imported from Canada , Mexico and the European Union] .
President Trump has decided to postpone for another month [ARG1: steep tariffs on steel and aluminum] [V: imported] [ARG2: from Canada , Mexico and the European Union] .
